Title: Requires the department of health to study the effects of certain training criteria established by the Lymphology Association of North America
Summary: Establishes the Lymphology study; requires the department of health to study the effects of certain training criteria established by the Lymphology Association of North America.
LawCode: Add Art 27-L ยง2799-t, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the lymphology study and requiring the department of health to study the effects of certain training criteria established by the Lymphology Association of North America
